member.name: JOBOBJECT_LIMIT_VIOLATION_INFORMATION_2
member.summary: Contains extended information about resource notification limits that have been exceeded for a job object. This structure is used with the function with the JobObjectLimitViolationInformation2 information class.

summary.para: Flags that identify the notification limits in effect for the job. This member is a bitfield that determines whether other structure members are used. This member can be any combination of the following values.

listheader.description: Value
Meaning
The job has a committed memory notification limit. The JobHighMemoryLimit member contains more information.
The job has a committed minimum memory notification limit. The JobLowMemoryLimit member contains more information.
The job has an I/O read bytes notification limit. The IoReadBytesLimit member contains more information.
The job has an I/O write bytes notification limit. The IoWriteBytesLimit member contains more information.
The job has a user-mode execution time notification limit. The PerJobUserTimeLimit member contains more information.
The job has notification limit for the extent to which a job can exceed its CPU rate control limit. The RateControlToleranceLimit member contains more information.
The job has notification limit for the extent to which a job can exceed its CPU rate control limit. The CpuRateControlToleranceLimit member contains more information.
The job has notification limit for the extent to which a job can exceed its I/O rate control limit. The IoRateControlToleranceLimit member contains more information.
The job has notification limit for the extent to which a job can exceed its network rate control limit. The NetRateControlToleranceLimit member contains more information.

summary.para: Flags that identify the notification limits that have been exceeded. This member is a bitfield that determines whether other structure members are used. This member can be any combination of the following values.

listheader.description: Value
Meaning
The job's I/O read bytes notification limit has been exceeded. The IoReadBytes member contains more information.
The job's I/O write bytes notification limit has been exceeded. The IoWriteBytes member contains more information.
The job's user-mode execution time notification limit has been exceeded. The PerJobUserTime member contains more information.
The job's committed maximum memory notification limit has been exceeded. The JobMemory member contains more information.
The job's committed memory has fallen below its minimum notification limit. The JobMemory member contains more information.
The job's CPU rate control limit has been exceeded. The RateControlTolerance member contains more information.
The job's CPU rate control limit has been exceeded. The CpuRateControlTolerance member contains more information.
The job's I/O rate control limit has been exceeded. The IoRateControlTolerance member contains more information.
The job's network rate control limit has been exceeded. The NetworkRateControlTolerance member contains more information.

member.name: JOBOBJECT_LIMIT_VIOLATION_INFORMATION_2.IoReadBytes
member.summary: If the ViolationLimitFlags member specifies JOB_OBJECT_LIMIT_JOB_READ_BYTES, this member contains the total I/O read bytes for all processes in the job at the time the notification was sent.

member.name: JOBOBJECT_LIMIT_VIOLATION_INFORMATION_2.IoReadBytesLimit
member.summary: If the LimitFlags member specifies JOB_OBJECT_LIMIT_JOB_READ_BYTES, this member contains the I/O read bytes notification limit in effect for the job.

member.name: JOBOBJECT_LIMIT_VIOLATION_INFORMATION_2.IoWriteBytes
member.summary: If the ViolationLimitFlags member specifies JOB_OBJECT_LIMIT_JOB_WRITE_BYTES, this member contains the total I/O write bytes for all processes in the job at the time the notification was sent.

member.name: JOBOBJECT_LIMIT_VIOLATION_INFORMATION_2.IoWriteBytesLimit
member.summary: If the LimitFlags member specifies JOB_OBJECT_LIMIT_JOB_WRITE_BYTES, this member contains the I/O write bytes notification limit in effect for the job.

member.name: JOBOBJECT_LIMIT_VIOLATION_INFORMATION_2.PerJobUserTime
member.summary: If the ViolationLimitFlags member specifies JOB_OBJECT_LIMIT_JOB_TIME, this member contains the total user-mode execution time for all processes in the job at the time the notification was sent.

member.name: JOBOBJECT_LIMIT_VIOLATION_INFORMATION_2.PerJobUserTimeLimit
member.summary: If the LimitFlags member specifies JOB_OBJECT_LIMIT_JOB_TIME, this member contains the user-mode execution notification limit in effect for the job.

member.name: JOBOBJECT_LIMIT_VIOLATION_INFORMATION_2.JobMemory
member.summary: If the ViolationLimitFlags member specifies JOB_OBJECT_LIMIT_JOB_MEMORY_HIGH or JOB_OBJECT_LIMIT_JOB_MEMORY_LOW, this member contains the committed memory for all processes in the job at the time the notification was sent.

member.name: JOBOBJECT_LIMIT_VIOLATION_INFORMATION_2.DUMMYUNIONNAME.JobHighMemoryLimit
member.summary: If the LimitFlags member specifies JOB_OBJECT_LIMIT_JOB_MEMORY_HIGH, this member contains the committed maximum memory limit in effect for the job.

member.name: JOBOBJECT_LIMIT_VIOLATION_INFORMATION_2.DUMMYUNIONNAME.JobMemoryLimit
member.summary: If the LimitFlags member specifies JOB_OBJECT_LIMIT_JOB_MEMORY, this member contains the committed maximum memory limit in effect for the job.

summary.para: If the LimitFlags member specifies JOB_OBJECT_LIMIT_RATE_CONTROL, this member specifies the extent to which the job exceeded its CPU rate control limits at the time the notification was sent. This member can be one of the following values.

listheader.description: Value
Meaning
The job exceeded its CPU rate control limits for 20% of the tolerance interval.
The job exceeded its CPU rate control limits for 40% of the tolerance interval.
The job exceeded its CPU rate control limits for 60% of the tolerance interval.

summary.para: If the LimitFlags member specifies JOB_OBJECT_LIMIT_CPU_RATE_CONTROL, this member specifies the extent to which the job exceeded its CPU rate control limits at the time the notification was sent. This member can be one of the following values.

listheader.description: Value
Meaning
The job exceeded its CPU rate control limits for 20% of the tolerance interval.
The job exceeded its CPU rate control limits for 40% of the tolerance interval.
The job exceeded its CPU rate control limits for 60% of the tolerance interval.

summary.para: If the LimitFlags member specifies JOB_OBJECT_LIMIT_RATE_CONTROL, this member contains the CPU rate control notification limits specified for the job.

listheader.description: Value
Meaning
The job can exceed its CPU rate control limits for 20% of the tolerance interval.
The job can exceed its CPU rate control limits for 40% of the tolerance interval.
The job can exceed its CPU rate control limits for 60% of the tolerance interval.

summary.para: If the LimitFlags parameter specifies JOB_OBJECT_LIMIT_CPU_RATE_CONTROL, this member contains the CPU rate control notification limits specified for the job.

listheader.description: Value
Meaning
The job can exceed its CPU rate control limits for 20% of the tolerance interval.
The job can exceed its CPU rate control limits for 40% of the tolerance interval.
The job can exceed its CPU rate control limits for 60% of the tolerance interval.

member.name: JOBOBJECT_LIMIT_VIOLATION_INFORMATION_2.JobLowMemoryLimit
member.summary: If the LimitFlags member specifies JOB_OBJECT_LIMIT_JOB_MEMORY_LOW, this member contains the committed minimum memory limit in effect for the job.

summary.para: If the LimitFlags member specifies JOB_OBJECT_LIMIT_IO_RATE_CONTROL, this member specifies the extent to which the job exceeded its I/O rate control limits at the time the notification was sent. This member can be one of the following values.

listheader.description: Value
Meaning
The job exceeded its I/O rate control limits for 20% of the tolerance interval.
The job exceeded its I/O rate control limits for 40% of the tolerance interval.
The job exceeded its I/O rate control limits for 60% of the tolerance interval.

summary.para: If the LimitFlags parameter specifies JOB_OBJECT_LIMIT_IO_RATE_CONTROL, this member contains the I/O rate control notification limits specified for the job.

listheader.description: Value
Meaning
The job can exceed its I/O rate control limits for 20% of the tolerance interval.
The job can exceed its I/O rate control limits for 40% of the tolerance interval.
The job can exceed its I/O rate control limits for 60% of the tolerance interval.

summary.para: If the LimitFlags member specifies JOB_OBJECT_LIMIT_NET_RATE_CONTROL, this member specifies the extent to which the job exceeded its network rate control limits at the time the notification was sent. This member can be one of the following values.

listheader.description: Value
Meaning
The job exceeded its network rate control limits for 20% of the tolerance interval.
The job exceeded its network rate control limits for 40% of the tolerance interval.
The job exceeded its network rate control limits for 60% of the tolerance interval.

summary.para: If the LimitFlags parameter specifies JOB_OBJECT_LIMIT_NETWORK_RATE_CONTROL, this member contains the network rate control notification limits specified for the job.

listheader.description: Value
Meaning
The job can exceed its network rate control limits for 20% of the tolerance interval.
The job can exceed its network rate control limits for 40% of the tolerance interval.
The job can exceed its network rate control limits for 60% of the tolerance interval.
